name: What Have You Drawn?
description:
In What Have You Drawn?, you are a young artist afraid of showing their work. Using your paint gun, you'll try rejecting the people who want to see your sketchbook. But do you really think improvement can be reached without confronting harsh criticism? Be cautious though! Too much criticism can lead to despair...

Will you become a famous artist or remain a pile of doubt and mediocrity?

This game has been made in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 50.

How to play? Leveling Up

In order to upgrade your character, you'll have to drop your sketchbook. A canvas appears on the map whenever an enemy hits you ; interact with it to gain new abilities! You can gain your life point back if you manage to pick up the book before your enemies do. You can only level up once in each world.

Coloring the world around you

Whenever you let your enemies pick up your sketchbook, their feedback helps you deepen your artistic skills. Your perspective on things change, and a brand new world appears before your eyes. It is now time to level up again!

Controls (better with a gamepad!)

The speed boost unlock at level 2, and the shockwave at level 4.

Keyboard
  • WASD to move (no need to switch to QWERTY if you don’t have that kind of keyboard)
  • E to interact with the canvas
  • Q to use the speed boost
  • Space to use the shockwave
  • Aim with the mouse, shoot with left click
Gamepad
  • Left Stick to move
  • A/Cross to interact with the canvas
  • B/Circle to speed boost
  • X/Square to shockwave
  • Right Trigger to shoot
  • Right stick to aim
